mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1870 September 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, September 10, 1870. Cape May. Completing arrangements for fire department. Craig digs drains to connect 3 springs. Tank to be on kitchen side. Plan also to water greenhouse. Boat profits poor - equals that of one month in 1868. Collecting funds for water system.
